meanings.definition: The state or quality of being foreign.
meanings.sent1: The foreignness of the new student stood out in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The foreignness of the spices in the dish added an interesting flavor.
meanings.sent3: The foreignness of the situation made everyone laugh at the misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: Her accent carried a sense of foreignness that intrigued everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The foreignness of the unfamiliar language made it difficult to communicate.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being from another country or culture.
meanings.sent1: The foreignness of her traditions fascinated her classmates.
meanings.sent2: The city's diversity brought a sense of foreignness to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The foreignness of the exotic food made him hesitant to try it.
meanings.sent4: His clothing style reflected a hint of foreignness that caught people's attention.
meanings.sent5: The foreignness of the customs made the experience feel like a journey to another world.
